tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
quoteText: We may not recognize Do-Not-Track (“DNT”) signals from your web browsers or device. This is because there is not yet a universally accepted standard on how to interpret and respond to DNT signals, which often conflict with other settings.
